Name: Little Tennis
About the game: Little Tennis is the most simple, yet addictive tennis game you'll have ever played! Simplifying the game of tennis to its core principals, use the mouse, the keyboard or a gamepad to control your player. Time your serves and perfect your returns to win games. Winning games allows you to earn gems in order to unlock new skins, colours, rackets, flags and clothing to customise your player.
